content: Maybe fans shouldn’t stop throwing money at businesses with bad business practices. I pretty much spend 0 dollars on pro sports being that they don’t feel the same kind of pressure to maintain customers due to many fans emotional bond with pro sports. I got fed up after the Twins got a new stadium and in the process promptly refused to sign half of their best players. We lost a still in his prime Johan Santana, Torii Hunter and Michael Cuddyer. Not to mention Francisco Liriano. And the team only spends a small amount to try and pull in past their prime stars who will take less.
